other_tests.findings: Trace amount of bilateral pleural effusion, more on the left; opacification in the left lung base possibly representing consolidation; normal liver size and morphology with mild steatosis; gallbladder contains stones without wall thickening; normal intra and extrahepatic biliary ducts; swollen pancreas with peripancreatic edema, main pancreatic duct not visualized; small amount of free fluid in the abdomen.
